title: Still Life on Table
provenance_text:
Edouard Vuillard [1868-1940], Paris, France; Vuillard estate [1]. Bianchini Gallery, New York, NY; gift of Bianchini Gallery to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1967 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The drawing is stamped with Vuillard estate stamp (Lugt 909c) at lower right. 
[2]. The drawing was received at Carnegie Institute from the gallery on December 29, 1966. It was accessioned on April 11, 1967.

creator.death_place: Baule, la (Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France)
